name: Keystroke
description:
This game was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Keystroke is a game where buttons on the player's rickety control panel break after minimal use, rendering the player out of controls. The player must maneuver through puzzling levels with a finite amount of button inputs to reach teleporters, collecting more buttons as they go and using keystrokes wisely. 

CONTROLS

Move = W,A,S,D  OR  Arrows

Space = Detonate

R = Abort/Restart
